text: jab mere bande mere baare mein aap se sawaal kare, to aap kehde ke main bahut hee qareeb hoon har pukaarne wale ki pukaar ko jab kabhi wo mujhe pukaare, qubool kaarta hoon, is liye logo ko bhi chaahiye ke wo meri baath maan liya kare aur mujh par imaan rakhe, yahi un ki bhalaayi ka baayes hai
